name: Rainbow Crystal Collection (Skill Card)
text:
Jesse / Skill
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
If a face-up "Crystal Beast" monster you control would be destroyed, you can place a Crystallization Counter on it instead.
Monsters with Crystallization Counters are considered Continuous Spell Cards in your Spell & Trap Zone instead of monsters.
If a card with a Crystallization Counter would be Special Summoned, remove the counter.
Cards with Crystallization Counters can be used as Fusion Material for "Ultimate Crystal" monsters.
